basic.description: For students wishing to refine their grammatical skills and develop strategies for effective writing through discussion and written travaux pratiques.
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Stratégies d'écriture en français

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite     FREN100 or FREN110 or (FREN101 and FREN102)
One-way Exclusion    May not be taken with or after FREN 344.
